Posts.Content: lorettaloretta wrote: My onc says no chemo but I see many peeps here w/ better dx's getting chemo, whatsup w/ that? Dx 5/10/2013, IDC, 2cm, Stage IIA, Grade 1, 0/11 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 5/13/2013 Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Right, Sentinel Hormonal Therapy 7/11/2013 Arimidex (anastrozole) Radiation Therapy 7/22/2013 Breast Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: llB, node negative, er+ pr+, Hertu - oncogene 10 and no chemo? lorettaloretta Nan54
